timeline.message:
Add ARM64 job to Travis-CI

Added ARM64 architecture to .travis.yml file.

Signed-off-by: odidev <odidev@puresoftware.com>

timeline.bodyText: I assume this is about build-bin/go_offline and will address it post merge.
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,6 +22,9 @@ services:
 
 # Re-use JDK 11 from focal release instead of delaying build with installation
 before_install:
+  - if [ "${TRAVIS_CPU_ARCH}" == "arm64" ]; then
+     sudo apt-get install -y maven;
